trans-unit.source: Prompts the user to select a folder.
trans-unit.target: 提示使用者選取資料夾。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a way to prompt the user to browse, create, and eventually select a folder.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別可用來提示使用者瀏覽、 建立以及最後選取的資料夾。

trans-unit.source: Use this class when you only want to allow the user to select folders, not files.
trans-unit.target: 當您只想允許使用者選取資料夾，而不是檔案時，請使用這個類別。

trans-unit.source: Browsing of the folders is done through a tree control.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽的資料夾是透過樹狀目錄控制項。

trans-unit.source: Only folders from the file system can be selected; virtual folders cannot.
trans-unit.target: 可以選取只從檔案系統資料夾。無法將虛擬資料夾。

trans-unit.source: Typically, after creating a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog>, you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A> to the location from which to start browsing.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言之後建立新, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog>，您將設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A>從這裡開始瀏覽位置。

trans-unit.source: Optionally, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A> to an absolute path of a subfolder of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A> that will initially be selected.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇性地設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A>至絕對路徑的子資料夾的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A>，一開始會選取。

trans-unit.source: You can also optionally set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.Description%2A> property to provide additional instructions to the user.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以選擇性地設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.Description%2A>屬性，以向使用者提供其他指示。

trans-unit.source: Finally, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A> method to display the dialog box to the user.
trans-unit.target: 最後，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A>方法，以向使用者顯示的對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: When the dialog box is closed and the dialog box result from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult.OK?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A> will be a string containing the path to the selected folder.
trans-unit.target: 當關閉對話方塊和對話方塊因<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult.OK?displayProperty=nameWithType>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A>是包含所選資料夾的路徑的字串。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.ShowNewFolderButton%2A> property to control if the user is able to create new folders with the **New Folder** button.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.ShowNewFolderButton%2A>屬性來控制使用者是否能夠建立新的資料夾與**新資料夾** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog> is a modal dialog box; therefore, when shown, it blocks the rest of the application until the user has chosen a folder.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog> 是強制回應對話方塊。因此，當顯示，它會封鎖應用程式的其餘部分直到使用者選擇的資料夾。

trans-unit.source: When a dialog box is displayed modally, no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 當對話方塊會顯示為強制回應，沒有輸入 （鍵盤或滑鼠按一下） 可以在對話方塊中的物件發生除外。

trans-unit.source: The program must hide or close the dialog box (usually in response to some user action) before input to the calling program can occur.
trans-unit.target: 程式必須隱藏或關閉對話方塊 （通常在某些使用者動作的回應） 之前呼叫程式輸入可能會發生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an application that enables the user to open rich text (.rtf) files within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立應用程式可讓使用者開啟中的 rich text 格式 (.rtf) 檔案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes properties to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 預設建構函式會初始化成為其預設值的屬性。

trans-unit.source: When a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog> is created, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Environment.SpecialFolder.Desktop?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.Description%2A> property is set to an empty string (""), the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A> property is set to an empty string, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.ShowNewFolderButton%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 當新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog>建立時，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Environment.SpecialFolder.Desktop?displayProperty=nameWithType>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.Description%2A>屬性設定為空字串 ("")、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A>屬性設定為空字串，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.ShowNewFolderButton%2A>屬性設定為`true`.

trans-unit.source: Typically, after creating a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog>, you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A> to the location from which to start browsing.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言之後建立新, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog>，您將設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A>從這裡開始瀏覽位置。

trans-unit.source: Optionally, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A> to the path of a subfolder of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A> that will initially be selected.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇性地設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A>的子資料夾的路徑<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A>，一開始會選取。

trans-unit.source: You can also optionally set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.Description%2A> property to provide additional instructions to the user.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以選擇性地設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.Description%2A>屬性，以向使用者提供其他指示。

trans-unit.source: Finally, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A> method to display the dialog box to the user.
trans-unit.target: 最後，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A>方法，以向使用者顯示的對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: When the dialog box is closed and the dialog result from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult.OK?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A> will be a string containing the path to the selected folder.
trans-unit.target: 當關閉對話方塊和對話方塊因<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult.OK?displayProperty=nameWithType>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A>是包含所選資料夾的路徑的字串。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog> is a modal dialog box; therefore, when shown, it blocks the rest of the application until the user has chosen a folder.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog> 是強制回應對話方塊。因此，當顯示，它會封鎖應用程式的其餘部分直到使用者選擇的資料夾。

trans-unit.source: When a dialog box is displayed modally, no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 當對話方塊會顯示為強制回應，沒有輸入 （鍵盤或滑鼠按一下） 可以在對話方塊中的物件發生除外。

trans-unit.source: The program must hide or close the dialog box (usually in response to some user action) before input to the calling program can occur.
trans-unit.target: 程式必須隱藏或關閉對話方塊 （通常在某些使用者動作的回應） 之前呼叫程式輸入可能會發生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an application that enables the user to open rich text (.rtf) files within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立應用程式可讓使用者開啟中的 rich text 格式 (.rtf) 檔案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the descriptive text displayed above the tree view control in the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定對話方塊中樹狀檢視控制項上方的描述性文字。

trans-unit.source: The description to display.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示的描述。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.Description%2A> property can be used to specify additional information to the user, like instructions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.Description%2A>屬性可以用來指定給使用者，例如指示的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an application that enables the user to open rich text (.rtf) files within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立應用程式可讓使用者開啟中的 rich text 格式 (.rtf) 檔案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the **Help** button on the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者按一下對話方塊上的 [說明] 按鈕時。

trans-unit.source: Resets properties to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 重設屬性為其預設值。

trans-unit.source: Resets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.Description%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.ShowNewFolderButton%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A> properties to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 重設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.Description%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.ShowNewFolderButton%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A>成為其預設值的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For a list of default values, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需預設值的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the root folder where the browsing starts from.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定開始瀏覽的根資料夾。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Environment.SpecialFolder" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Environment.SpecialFolder" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Desktop" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="Desktop" />。

trans-unit.source: Only the specified folder and any subfolders that are beneath it will appear in the dialog box and be selectable.
trans-unit.target: 指定的資料夾和其下的任何子資料夾將會出現在對話方塊中，並供選取。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A> property, along with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A>, determines what the selected folder will be when the dialog box is displayed, as long as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A> is an absolute path that is a subfolder of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A> (or more accurately, points to a subfolder of the shell namespace represented by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A>).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A>屬性，連同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A>，您決定所選取的資料夾 對話方塊時顯示，只要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A>是絕對路徑的資料夾的子資料夾<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A>（或更精確地說，資料點的子資料夾所代表的殼層命名空間<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an application that enables the user to open rich text (.rtf) files within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立應用程式可讓使用者開啟中的 rich text 格式 (.rtf) 檔案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Environment.SpecialFolder" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 所指派的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Environment.SpecialFolder" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定使用者所選取的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path of the folder first selected in the dialog box or the last folder selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: 在對話方塊中第一個選取的資料夾路徑或由使用者選取的最後一個資料夾。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A> property is set before showing the dialog box, the folder with this path will be the selected folder, as long as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A> is set to an absolute path that is a subfolder of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A> (or more accurately, points to a subfolder of the shell namespace represented by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A>屬性設定顯示對話方塊前，使用此路徑的資料夾將會選取的資料夾，因此只要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A>設為的子資料夾的絕對路徑<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A>（或更精確地說，資料點的子資料夾的殼層命名空間所表示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A> returns <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult.OK>, meaning the user clicked the **OK** button, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A> property will return a string containing the path to the selected folder.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult.OK>，這表示使用者已按下**確定** 按鈕，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A>屬性會傳回字串，包含所選資料夾的路徑。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A> returns <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult.Cancel>, meaning the user canceled out of the dialog box, this property will have the same value that it had prior to displaying the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult.Cancel>，這表示使用者取消對話方塊中，此屬性會有相同的值與它的之前顯示對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: If the user selects a folder that does not have a physical path (for example, My Computer), the **OK** button on the dialog box will be disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者選取的資料夾沒有實體路徑 （例如，我的電腦）**確定**對話方塊上的按鈕將會停用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an application that enables the user to open rich text (.rtf) files within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立應用程式可讓使用者開啟中的 rich text 格式 (.rtf) 檔案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: for getting the path.
trans-unit.target: 取得路徑。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the **New Folder** button appears in the folder browser dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否在資料夾瀏覽器對話方塊中顯示 [新增資料夾] 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the **New Folder** button is shown in the dialog box; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果**新資料夾**按鈕是顯示在對話方塊中，否則<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.ShowNewFolderButton%2A> is `true`, the **New Folder** button is visible, giving the user a chance to create a folder.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.ShowNewFolderButton%2A>是`true`、**新資料夾**按鈕就會顯示讓使用者有機會建立資料夾。

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the **New Folder** button, a new folder is created and the user is prompted to specify the folder name.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下**新資料夾** 按鈕，建立新的資料夾，並提示使用者指定的資料夾名稱。

trans-unit.source: The selected node in the tree becomes the parent of the new folder.
trans-unit.target: 在樹狀目錄中選取的節點會變成新資料夾的父系。

trans-unit.source: The actual caption of the **New Folder** button can vary depending upon the operating system
trans-unit.target: 實際的標題**新資料夾**按鈕可以依據作業系統而

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.ShowNewFolderButton%2A> to `false` does not work on Windows 2000.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.ShowNewFolderButton%2A>至`false`無法在 Windows 2000 上執行。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an application that enables the user to open rich text (.rtf) files within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立應用程式可讓使用者開啟中的 rich text 格式 (.rtf) 檔案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控制項。
